name: InterSpinner
description:
Hey guys, this is the third game I have made. This game is made for the game jam https://itch.io/jam/unity-course-community-jam, which theme is "SPIN", and inspired by the film Interstellar. Hope you like it : )

Source: GitHub

The Jet SFX was modified from the work made by dklon, downloaded from https://opengameart.org/content/jet-engine-takeoff

The Skybox was made by Adam Bielecki, downloaded from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/milky-way-skybox-940...

The BGM was made by Osmic, downloaded from https://opengameart.org/content/space-ambient

Game Tip:  You can try aligning the spacecraft body, the wings or the black circle on it with the yellow cylinder, which is holo, for easier docking.

[1.0.5] First publish.

[1.0.6] Code change only, no gameplay changed.

[1.0.8] Added UI animations. One of the Docks now should be easier to lane. Fixed a bug where the Meters flip when its value is around -00.0 and +00.0, now should be easier to read.

[1.1.0] Add BGM, New Level and Level adjustment. The docks are now easier to see. The Tutorial Level now has images and Fuel refill.

[1.1.1] Clamped camera tilt. Added boundary, now can't go too far from the stations
